header_text: You are new to a job, and your boss asks you to do a task. You finish it before the deadline and your boss immediately points out that you made a mistake. Your boss probably thinks you are a failure.

elements.Text: Does your boss believe that your work holds promise?

elements.name: You are new to a job, and your boss asks you to do a task. You finish it before the deadline and your boss immediately points out that you made a mistake. Your boss probably thinks you are a failure._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
